sections.title: Electrical Units and Concepts
prompts: Explain the concept of electrical current and its unit of measurement.
Describe the relationship between voltage, current, and resistance.
Discuss why metals are good conductors of electricity.
Define frequency and its unit of measurement.
Explain the difference between conductors and insulators.

image_prompts.prompt: Diagram showing the flow of electrons in a conductor
image_prompts.caption: Electron flow in a conductor
image_prompts.label: fig:electron_flow

table_prompt.prompt: Table comparing units of electrical measurement
table_prompt.caption: Units of Electrical Measurement
table_prompt.label: tab:electrical_units

sections.title: Alternating Current and Power
prompts: Explain the concept of alternating current and how it differs from direct current.
Describe the relationship between electrical power, voltage, and current.
Discuss how resistance affects current flow in AC and DC circuits.
Define the frequency of alternating current and its significance.

sections.title: Electrical Measurements
prompts: Explain how to convert between different units of electrical measurement.
Discuss the significance of frequency in electrical measurements.
Describe the relationship between volts, millivolts, and microvolts.
Explain the concept of capacitance and its units.

image_prompts.prompt: Diagram showing unit conversions for electrical measurements
image_prompts.caption: Unit conversions for electrical measurements
image_prompts.label: fig:unit_conversions

table_prompt.prompt: Table showing common electrical unit conversions
table_prompt.caption: Common Electrical Unit Conversions
table_prompt.label: tab:unit_conversions

sections.title: Decibels and Power
prompts: Explain the concept of decibels and their use in measuring power changes.
Discuss how decibels represent power increases and decreases.
Describe the logarithmic nature of the decibel scale.

image_prompts.prompt: Graph showing power changes in decibels
image_prompts.caption: Power changes in decibels
image_prompts.label: fig:decibel_power

sections.title: Capacitance and Inductance
concepts: Energy storage in electric and magnetic fields
prompts: Explain the concept of capacitance and its unit of measurement.
Describe the ability to store energy in a magnetic field and its unit of measurement.
Discuss the concept of impedance and its significance in AC circuits.
Explain how energy is stored in electric and magnetic fields.

image_prompts.prompt: Diagram showing a capacitor and inductor in a circuit
image_prompts.caption: Capacitor and inductor in a circuit
image_prompts.label: fig:capacitor_inductor

sections.title: Power Calculations
prompts: Explain the formula used to calculate electrical power in a DC circuit.
Discuss how to calculate power given voltage and current.
Describe the relationship between power, voltage, and current in a circuit.

image_prompts.prompt: Diagram showing power calculation in a DC circuit
image_prompts.caption: Power calculation in a DC circuit
image_prompts.label: fig:power_calculation

sections.title: Circuit Analysis
prompts: Explain Ohm's Law and its significance in circuit analysis.
Discuss how to calculate current, voltage, and resistance in a circuit.
Describe the relationship between voltage, current, and resistance in a circuit.

sections.title: Series and Parallel Circuits
prompts: Explain the characteristics of series circuits.
Discuss the characteristics of parallel circuits.
Describe how current and voltage behave in series and parallel circuits.

image_prompts.caption: Series and parallel circuits
